items.text: shortish, ends up turning down the leg side, can't connect with the pull
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Ambris, 1 wide

items.text: slower and fuller, on middle and leg, clipped away through square leg
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Ambris, 1 run

items.text: shot! That's not a short ball, it's a good-length ball spinning in towards middle stump, and he clears his front leg, bends at the knees to get down low, and pulls firmly to deep square leg
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Hope, 1 run

items.text: back of a length on middle stump, whipped to deep square leg
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Ambris, 1 run

items.text: length ball turning in towards leg stump, excellent fielding from Mehidy at straight midwicket - the offspinner's best friend - to dive left and intercept the attempted punch to long-on
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Hope, no run

items.preText: Spin from both ends. Here's Mehidy.
items.text: back of a length outside off, punched to the left of long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Ambris, 2 runs

items.text: nicely flighted on off stump, gets forward to clip it down to long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Ambris, 1 run

items.text: length ball outside off, makes a bit of room and slaps it away to the left of deep extra-cover
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 2 runs

items.text: tossed up nicely on off stump, gets a bit of dip, stretches out to push into the covers
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: nicely flighted again, outside off, blocked back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Ambris, no run

items.text: flighted ball, a little wider, stretches out to drive it back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Ambris, no run

items.preText: Bimal Sinha: "Hope is the Kohli of WI. Consistency at its best!"
items.text: length ball on middle and leg, clipped to the right of deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Hope, 1 run

items.text: flighted ball wide of off, leans over the ball and uses his wrists to work it through midwicket
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Ambris, 1 run

items.text: full on off stump, driven to long-on
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Hope, 1 run

items.text: dangled up full on off stump. Ambris closes his bat face early, and ends up popping a leading edge at dangerously catching height, far enough to the left of the bowler, though
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Ambris, no run

items.text: back of a length on off stump, punched to long-off
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Ambris, 1 run

items.text: back of a length on off stump, makes some room and punches straight to cover
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Hope, no run

items.text: flat length ball on off stump, punched firmly and point moves quickly to his right to half-stop it
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Ambris, 1 run

items.text: tossed up outside off, nice stretch forward to drive to long-off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: nice flight on off stump, dips a bit as he comes forward to drive to long-off. Turns in and goes to long-on off the inside half of the bat
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Ambris, 1 run

items.text: full on middle stump, nice stride forward to clip to midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: length ball on middle stump, clipped to midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: tossed up full on off stump, driven to long-off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.preText: Another bowling change. More spin, here's Sabbir to bowl some legbreaks.
items.text: appeal for lbw as Hope closes his bat face too early for the front-foot flick. Probably pitched outside leg
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Hope, no run

items.text: length ball on middle stump, makes room to drive inside-out to the left of long-off
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Hope, 2 runs
